title: Why 2026 Will Be the Year of the Intelligent Customer Data Platform
description: Smarter AI Starts with Smarter Data AI spending keeps climbing at an unbelievable pace. Some of the largest U.S. tech companies plan to pour more than $320 billion into AI and supporting infrastructure. With numbers like that, you’d expect breakthrough result…
